DOC.brief_summary: In France, consumption of hypnotic drugs is high. In this context, and given the planned regulatory modifications, it seems essential to make an inventory of the consumption of drugs taken for a hypnotic purpose. This study aims to identify the substances (medical or not) used for a hypnotic purpose in the adult population going to a pharmacy.
DOC.brief_title: Current Situation on the Consumption of Hypnotic Substances at the Pharmacy
